code:
%% Diagram 2: Core / Periphery as time-indexed roles
%% Labels adjusted to reflect RoleAssignment pattern explicitly

gantt
  title Core and Periphery as Time-Indexed Role Assignments (Logistics_StockLevel)
  dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
  axisFormat  %Y-%m

  section SemiosphereContext ctx1
  RoleAssignment ra1: sysB assigned PeripheryRole   :a1, 2026-01-01, 2026-06-30
  RoleAssignment ra2: sysB assigned CoreRole        :a2, 2026-07-01, 2026-12-31

  section Guardrail
  Roles are reversible over time                    :milestone, m1, 2026-07-01, 0d

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 Logistics_StockLevel 的分支。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Logistics_StockLevel'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

extra.repo_description: A theory-aligned OWL and SHACL ontology formalizing Juri Lotman’s semiosphere with enforceable computational guardrails.
